front.title: An Extension to the XML Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP) for Manipulating Multiple Elements

abstract.t: The Extensible Markup Language (XML) Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP) provides a mechanism for getting and putting XML documents, elements and attributes to a server. XCAP only allows each operation to operate on a single document, element or attribute at a time. This specification defines an extension to XCAP that allows for manipulation of multiple XML elements within a single operation.
